entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 7:31 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7.
